sentences.en: Basically be professional, the service is good. Blame sincere not faze!
sentences.cn: 主要是专业, 服务好. 非诚勿扰!

sentences.en: Be like intended person contact directly with oneself please, intermediary not faze!
sentences.cn: 如想要向人士请与个人直接联系, 中介请勿打扰!

sentences.en: Big concert halls do not faze Melanie.
sentences.cn: 巨大的音乐厅不会让梅拉妮发慌。

sentences.en: John was embarrassed, but it didn’t faze Mike a bit.
sentences.cn: 约翰很尴尬，但迈克并没有觉得困窘。

sentences.en: Nothing they say could faze him.
sentences.cn: 他们说什麽都烦扰不了他.

sentences.en: She's so calm, nothing seems to faze her.
She's so calm; nothing seems to faze her.
sentences.cn: 她很镇静, 遇事不慌.

trans.tran_cn: 打扰, 折磨, 使狼狈, 使担忧
